title: Solar Bluetooth Speaker/Power Bank, ZeroLemon SolarSound 72-Hour Playtime Solar-powered 10W Portable Wireless Bluetooth 4.0 Speaker & Power Bank for Smartphone-charging, Aux Audio/TF Card Supported
feature: Longest Playtime in the Market with Solar Technology: Incredible 72-hour/1500-song playtime powered by a built-in 10000mAh Li-polymer battery. With built-in solar technology, the SolarSound converts and stores solar energy from sunlight for emergencies and outdoor.
Crystal Clear & Superior Bass Sound: Enjoy your music in 10W stereo sound through dual high-performance drivers and superior enhanced bass performance.

Charges your Smartphone on the go: The SolarSound can also be used as a 10000mAh power bank. Simply plug your phone or tablet into the SolarBass Bluetooth 4.0 Speaker and it will charge your device while playing music.

Bluetooth 4.0 technology: Compatible with all Bluetooth-enabled devices. Instantly connect to your smartphone or tablet from up to 32 foot away. SolarSound reconnects automatically to the last device used.
What You Get: 1x ZeroLemon SolarSound Bluetooth 4.0 Speaker, 1x Micro USB Cable, 1x 1 x ZeroLemon Warranty Card. ZeroLemon 24-Months Warranty and 24 Hours/7 Days Customer Service.
description: ZeroLemon SolarSound Portable Bluetooth SpeakerEnjoy your music in 10W stereo sound through dual high-performance drivers and superior enhanced bass performance. Longest playtime 72 hours in the market with built-in 10000mAh Li-polymer battery for electronic devices chargingSolar charging and one Micro-USB input; Two USB outputs provide 5V/2A faster charging speed; Aux Audio/TF Card Supported.
